name: FateCraft & The Terrific Bunny
description:
FateCraft & The Terrific Bunny,

A project that I started a couple of months ago but canceled right after because of my lack of knowledge on shooter games. However, a few days ago, I came across THIS game jam and figured why not finish it. So I did. Here's the final result! (You might find some bugs and that's totally normal, because I had to rush it near the end.)

------------------------------------------------------------

You play as Fate, an adventurous fox. Your mission is to defeat the evil, terrific, king bunny, who's been terrorizing your city for weeks now. Gear up and save your friends!
